title: Visualizing how S3 deletes 1 billion objects with Athena and Rust | Tom Forbes
description: A few weeks ago I had the chance to delete 1 petabyte of data spread across 1 billion objects from S3. Well, actually 940 million, but close enough to the click-baitable 1 billion.
